title: TimtheYoutuber
author: TimtheYoutuber
content: Hi all,I am looking for someone to create a logo for more, will need a few different iterations of it. I have an idea I can post for you. I will then need an HTML webpage, in which I have an idea as well. But lets first start with the logo, post your telegrams and I will contact. Paying whatever major crypto.

comments.author: usekevin
comments.body: Quote from: TimtheYoutuber on November 21, 2023, 12:16:54 PMHi all,I am looking for someone to create a logo for more, will need a few different iterations of it. I have an idea I can post for you. I will then need an HTML webpage, in which I have an idea as well. But lets first start with the logo, post your telegrams and I will contact. Paying whatever major crypto. It’s seems to be the impressive one,if you had mentioned your telegram Id or mail.Someone may contact you directly,because after they had mentioned their telegram id.You need to find in this thread and you need to text on the telegram.Then he need to check your messages on the telegram id,So it will be very complicated one.My suggestion is your can include your mail id or telegram id,So the process time will take be very low.The possibility of getting the right person will be more and time efficient.You should ask their previous work of logo or HTML web page.This forum contain huge number of working people with more skills and experience.So you had made the post at the right place.Cheers!!

comments.author: Catenaccio
comments.body: You can host a graphic design contest to get more choices for your need.If you don't want to host a graphic design contest, you can consider some designersjayce designsicalical designsMeddzs designs

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: TimtheYoutuber on November 21, 2023, 12:16:54 PMHi all,I am looking for someone to create a logo for more, will need a few different iterations of it. I have an idea I can post for you. I will then need an HTML webpage, in which I have an idea as well. But lets first start with the logo, post your telegrams and I will contact. Paying whatever major crypto. There are lots of prominent designers here as their names are already being mentioned by Catenaccio for your perusal. You are free to contact them for your job offer and see how you can reach to an agreement for your job to be done. You can as well try his suggestion if you want it a competitive way to get the best out of them or all other web and logo designers present on this platform.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.created_time: November 21, 2023, 01:48:33 PMLast edit: November 22, 2023, 05:45:27 PM by CCMS
comments.body: My TG ID is @ccmsme . Please let me know if you need kind of LOGO design.Update : This user has started a conversation with me and ID is : t.me/cryptotim2There is no payment info yet even after asking multiple times .WARNING : This user is a time waster.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: I am a graphics designer, product designer and web developer. Am yet to post my service thread since am still working on some project.  I am interested in your job offer but i would love if all conversations and negotiations to be held in the forum as i do not prefer telegram. I like transparency in everything i do. If you don't like it that way i  think going for what Catenaccio suggested is better. As i can participate there and show my skill and talent. Goodluck in finding the right person. You can hit me up if you want to work with me.
